nodes.text: I'm curious about you, Honey - who is your sponsor, and just why did they send you here?

nodes.name: Who's My Sponsor?
nodes.description: Sophia thinks that someone is paying my way to stay here at the school. My mother certainly can't afford this place. So who wants me here... and why?

options.text: Say Something Sweet to Charm Sophia

nodes.text: I would have come to the school a lot sooner if I knew there was someone like you here.
You're cute, kid.

options.text: Say Something Cunning to Impress Sophia

nodes.text: Actually, I was sent to the school. It seems that I have a great deal of potential.
Well, we'll just have to see how much potential you really have.

options.text: Say Something Outrageous to Mislead Sophia

nodes.text: I thought I'd check out a few things here for my boss. He likes to keep tabs on places and had me case the joint while I'm at it.
Interesting... So who's your boss?
Ah, that would be telling!
Oh... really?

options.text: Say Something Sweet to Charm Sophia

nodes.text: So why is someone as lovely as you stuck working in this crummy corner of a castle?
It's a living. Besides, the job has its compensations. You never know who will show up for a chat...

options.text: Say Something Clever to Learn About Sophia

nodes.text: You're clearly not from around here... so what brought you to Caligari? It's not exactly the social center of the world like Silmaria is.
I do a lot of traveling. I like seeing new places and meeting new people. Caligari is no worse than many of the other cities I've seen.

options.text: Say Something Snarky to Please Sophia

nodes.text: So I bet you are the sort of person who knows all the dirt and gossip about everything that goes on around here.
I like to keep track of things, yes. And Sweetie, I am always happy to learn more...

options.text: Say Something Flirtatious to Charm Sophia

nodes.text: I'd like to have you for a sponsor.
That's sweet, kid.
Hmph.
What do you mean by asking about a sponsor? Am I supposed to have one?
Judging from your shabby clothing, you aren't exactly Mr. Moneybags. And somehow, I don't think you got here by your good looks and charm alone. So who's paying your tuition, Sweetie?
I really don't know who is supporting me here.
Well, if I were you, I'd want to know exactly who it is that wants me to be here. There's no such thing as a free lunch. You'll be paying for this one way or another.
I was brought to this school by a bearded, one-eyed stranger I'd never seen before.
So why did you follow him?
He made me an offer I couldn't refuse.
I'm not at liberty to answer that question. My sponsor likes to keep secrets.
My sponsor wishes to remain anonymous. It's better that you don't know... and don't ask.
I'll see you later.
Come back again soon, Cutie. I like you.
